component_summary.name: NavigationMenu
component_summary.description: Collection of styled navigation menu primitives built on @radix-ui/react-navigation-menu. Exposes a responsive navigation menu with a viewport, triggers, content, indicators and links. Uses navigationMenuTriggerStyle from helpers for trigger styling.

notes: Presentation-only components that delegate behavior to Radix primitives.
Relies on navigationMenuTriggerStyle helper for trigger appearance; consider centralizing styling helpers if duplicated elsewhere.
